alert.note: Alert for Robertson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 26 at 1:24AM CDT until June 26 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT FOR SUMNER AND EASTERN ROBERTSON COUNTIES... At 124 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Westmoreland, or 10 miles northeast of Gallatin, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gallatin, Hendersonville, Goodlettsville, White House, Millersville, Cross Plains, Portland, Orlinda, Cottontown, Bethpage, Oak Grove and Bledsoe Creek State Park. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 98 and 118. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
